text: Marc Carlos Francis de Jesus de Leon (born February 20, 1995), better known as McCoy de Leon, is a Filipino actor and dancer. He is known as a member of #Hashtags, a male-group dance performer on the noontime variety show It's Showtime on ABS-CBN. In 2016, he joined Pinoy Big Brother: Lucky 7 along with his co-hashtag member Nikko Natividad as a 2-in-1 celebrity housemate. ==Early life and education== De Leon attended high school at San Sebastian College – Recoletos. He then tried to obtain a Bachelor of Science in Civil Engineering at Mapúa University, but decided to stop to pursue his career. ==Filmography== ===Movies=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !
